ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Ian C. Meiklem ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. IAN C. MEIKLEM, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective December 27, 2018.
